name: Lair of the Scare
description:
Heroes have started invading your lair, and as a cultured Gentlemonster, the only way to get rid of them is to scare them off.

Arrow Keys and WASD move your monster, Spacebar scares.

Use stealth to sneak up on the heroes, and spook them out by making haunting noises while not being seen. Once they're nervous, pounce out and give them a good loud scare!

Made in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 33.
